projectDescription: Lum Network introduces the first decentralized protocol for businesses to build authentic trust with their customers.

eligibilityCriteria.description: ATOM stakers - minimum 5 ATOM staked, maximum cap at 3,000 ATOM, centralized exchanges and their delegators are excluded from the airdrop

OSMO liquidity providers - minimum 30 OSMO provided as liquidity, maximum cap at 20,000 OSMO, only bonded LPs have been taken into account, only the pools with an OSMO pair have been taken into account

claimActions.description: Vote on a Lum Network Governance proposal
